heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Undertakings

(Amendment) 

in Transferable Securities)

for Collective

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 2. The European Union (Undertakings for Collective Investment in
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Undertakings for Collective Investment in 
Transferable Securities) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 352 of 2011) are amended 
in Regulation 37 by the substitution of the following paragraph for paragraph 
(5): 

“(5) In the event of the insolvency of the depositary and any third 
party, or of the depositary or any third party, located in the Union to 
which custody of UCITS assets has been delegated, the assets of a 
UCITS held in custody shall be unavailable for distribution among, or 
redistribution among, or realisation for the benefit of, creditors of that 
depositary and such third party, or that depositary or such third party, as 
the case may be.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 December, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ No. L 302, 17.11.2009, p. 32 
2 OJ No. L 257, 28.08.2014, p. 186 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [629] 3

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to ensure the UCITS Regulations are in 
alignment with EU requirements. 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Undertakings for 
Collective Investment in Transferable Securities) (Amendment) Regulations
